summary: Implemented all 7 UI components (Button, Input, Card, Badge, Spinner, QRCode, CopyButton) plus index file per spec 03-shared-components.md. All components include proper TypeScript interfaces, WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility features, and follow exact visual specifications.
decisions: Used inline SVG icons for CopyButton instead of external icon library
Added motion-reduce:animate-none to Spinner for accessibility
Truncate QR code value display when longer than 35 chars
